summary: This is a scheduling order email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, transmitting a court scheduling order related to case 20 Cr. 330 (JAJN), indicating ongoing legal proceedings in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Sends the scheduling order email from the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Scheduling Order Transmission
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends a scheduling order via email regarding case 20 Cr. 330 (JAJN).

locations.context: Office of the Assistant United States Attorney, Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: The document is a scheduling order related to case 20 Cr. 330 (JAJN), indicating ongoing legal proceedings in the Epstein case as of October 2020.
The email originates from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, showing continued federal prosecution involvement.
The attachment filename '2020.07.15,_GM,_20_Cr._330JAJN),_Scheduling_Order.pdf' suggests the order was originally issued on July 15, 2020.
